                        Key Skills: Base SAS, Advanced SAS (PROC SQL, SAS Macros), Project Management

Work Experience

· Analyst Programmer
· 4 .8 years in the SAS programming and querying the database using SQL.

Current Experience (Sept, 2016- Present) – Wipro Limited, Gurgaon, India.

· Strong mentoring skills with experience in building Strategies, Stakeholder interaction, Project planning. Estimation, Expectation and Risk Management, cross-functional Process/Team Interactions.
· Work with Operations team that directly deals with clients to clarify requirements and provide detailed analysis and design test plans accordingly.
· Develop High end efficient codes using Base and Advanced SAS including Proc SQL to implement the requirements.
· Work on Ad-hoc requests like SAS reporting.
· Read and write data to DB2 (database system) in fixed position or delimited formats as per requirements.
· Manage a team of 2-3 programmers and lead training programs.
· 
Major projects Undertaken

· Implementing Interfaces for New Client
Description:
As the name suggests when a new client signs the requirements handoff, we build new interfaces providing them HM services to fulfill their needs; using the SAS programs for each interface.

Issues Faced:
Creating test files as per client file formats and loading them to our systems via HR and Payroll feeds.
Big clients have huge data with high number of interfaces and complexity, which is difficult to handle.
It involves so many derivation, mapping and functions to be used in SAS to get the expected results with error checks and validations.

· Modification Project for Existing Client
Description:
Whenever an existing client asks for some significant requirement changes, we create change orders and do Analysis, configuration, testing and deployment as per SDLC principles.

Issues Faced:
We have to compare the current requirements with existing requirements, to figure out the actual feasibility of changes to meet the client satisfaction while being concise and stringent in our approach without altering the overall functionality and purpose of the results.

Since we charge our clients on this, we have to very careful while delivering these projects. We have to do the integration testing too to make sure the existing piece is not altered with the changes coming around few fields.

· Customized SAS Reporting
Description:
There are situations where client needs some reports for their data on our system to do audit on their ends to make sure their data is safe and accurate on our end.

Issue Faced:
Generally, we do have monthly reports and checks to be sent over to the client. Those reports are mainly Proc SQL based ones with just formatting changes during output via SAS manipulations. Custom Reports have very tight deadlines including the same day delivery with Client closely watching our CMs for the reports.

· Shimmer Award in July, 2019.
